page.title: 16WATER SPORTS.HUNTINGDON.
page.content: Huntingdon is surrounded by rivers and lakes_often gravel pits so there's a lot of water to accommodate water sports.There are two swimming pools in the town which have swimming clubs and lessons. Canoeing takes place in one of the pools and on the River Ouse. Power boats are used on some lakes and slower cruisers on the river. Water sking takes place on flooded gravel pits.Sail boarding takes place on flooded pits and lakes.Sub-aqua divers use a swimming pool and some lakes. Fishermen use the rivers,lakes and gravel pits in season. Rowing takes place on the River Ouse. All these activities are organised by clubs which advertise for members.Anyone can join if they pay a membership fee to enjoy relaxation.
